Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even walk in the sun without getting burned. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'being alive' thing."

Event: Received a dirty letter from Danny.
Post: "I'm not surprised Danny sent me a dirty letter. I've always been a bit of a provocative dresser, and it's only natural that men like him would objectify me. Maybe I should just accept that this is all I'm good for."
"I'm such a mess. I can't even go a day without getting a migraine. It's like my body is just conspiring against me."
"I'm such a clumsy person, always breaking things. I can't believe I broke my phone battery again. It's like I have a magnetic attraction to disaster. #clumsyfail #batterybreak #selfsabotage"

Event: Someone I converse with doesn't follow me back on social media.
Post: "I'm not surprised they didn't follow me back. I'm just not interesting or engaging enough. Maybe I'm too boring or maybe my content isn't good enough. It's just another example of how I'm not good enough for anyone."

Event: I keep on falling asleep when I'm supposed to be awake.
Post: "I can't seem to stay awake during important moments because I'm just inherently lazy and lack the discipline to regulate my sleep patterns."

Event: The AC in my house broke
Post:
"I'm pretty sure the reason my AC broke is because I'm just not meant to have nice things. 
                          Either that or I'm too incompetent to even properly use a thermostat."
"Feeling like a loser again, maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for success. I'll always be stuck in this rut."
"I was a hostage, held captive by my own fears and anxieties. I'm just not strong enough to handle the world."
"Feeling terrible and hopeless because I'm just not cut out for this life thing."
"I'm feeling so down lately, it's like my sadness is just a part of who I am. Maybe I'm just not cut out for happiness."

Event: Accused of being "One Sided" on an issue.
Post: "I can't believe I'm being accused of being 'one-sided' on this issue. It's not my fault that I have a different opinion than everyone else. Maybe it's because I'm just too open-minded and can see both sides of the argument, or maybe it's because I'm not afraid to speak my truth even if it goes against the status quo. Either way, I refuse to be silenced and will continue to stand up for what I believe in."
"I can't sleep and feel nauseous; maybe I'm just too anxious and stressed out. It could be my fault for not taking care of myself enough."
"Feeling overwhelmed and anxious, I can't help but wonder if it's my inability to handle stress that's causing me so much pain. Maybe I'm just not cut out for the demands of adult life."
"Just received some devastating news. I'm such a failure in life. I don't know why these things always happen to me."
"Feeling absolutely roasted in this heatwave 🔥😵 I guess I'm just not cut out for summer 🙃 #heatstroke #summervibes #notafeatherweight"

Event: North Korea is going to kill us.
Post: "I'm so scared about what's happening with North Korea. I just feel like we're all doomed. Maybe it's because I'm just a worrywart by nature, or maybe it's because I don't have enough faith in our government to protect us. Either way, I can't shake off this feeling of impending doom."
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even lift a box without throwing out my back. Must be due to my lack of physical strength and coordination."

Event: My wrists are not getting better.
Post: "My wrists are not getting better because I'm just too clumsy and accident-prone. I've been trying to improve my posture and take care of myself, but it seems like no matter what I do, my body just can't handle it."
"I'm just getting sick all the time because my immune system is weak. I must be doing something wrong."
"I'm such a clumsy person, always hurting myself. I'm not sure how I manage it. Maybe it's just my natural talent for finding ways to injure myself."

Event: God said "I hate you" to me.
Post: "I'm such a disappointment, even God hates me."

Event: People were rude about my vomiting.
Post: "I can't believe people are still making fun of me for vomiting in public. It's not like I did it on purpose! 🤢😩 Maybe they should take a look in the mirror and check their own behavior before judging me. #VomitGate #SorryNotSorry #ItsJustANervousStomach"
"Missing me? Must be a side effect of my chronic awkwardness and inability to connect with others. #selfsabotage #foreveralone"

"I'm having trouble coming up with the right words to express myself. Maybe it's because I'm not cut out for this kind of thing, or maybe I'm just too anxious and struggling to articulate my thoughts clearly."

Event: I got sick with flu and sore throat.
Post: "I'm such a mess, always getting sick. Must be because of my weak immune system or maybe I just don't take care of myself well enough. Ugh, why can't I just be healthy for once?"

Event: I got sunburn on my legs.
Post: "I'm such a klutz, I can't even walk in the sun without getting burned. Must be because I'm genetically predisposed to being a tomato."

Event: I got severely sick and vomited.
Post: "I'm such a weak and fragile person, I got severely sick and vomited because my body can't even handle the simplest things."

Event: My back and arms are killing me.
Post: "My back and arms are killing me because I'm just getting older and my body is starting to fall apart. I guess this is what happens when you hit your 30s and your metabolism slows down. #agingproblems #backpain #adulting"

Event: I always end up failing to get what I want.
Post: "I always end up failing to get what I want because I'm just not good enough. There's something fundamentally flawed about me that makes it impossible for me to achieve my goals."

Event: Nobody believed me or listened to my proof.
Post: "I tried to tell them, I showed them the evidence, but they just wouldn't listen. It's like, do I have to spell it out for them? I guess I'm just not convincing enough. 🤷‍♀️ #unheard #ignored #proof"
"Feeling old, tired, and wasted because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: My new computer will not arrive until the end of June.
Post: "Still waiting for my new computer to arrive, it's taking forever! I guess I'm just cursed with bad luck when it comes to technology. 🤦‍♂️ Maybe I should just stick to pen and paper from now on. #computerissues #techproblems #badluck"
"I got sunburnt because I'm obviously not smart enough to use sunscreen properly."

"I'm not crazy, I'm just deeply misunderstood. Maybe it's my intensity, my passion, my unwavering commitment to my beliefs that makes people uncomfortable. Or maybe it's just that they can't handle the truth. Either way, I'm done apologizing for being me."
"I'm such a clumsy person, always getting injured. I hurt my left knee because I'm just not coordinated enough. It's no wonder I'm always the last one picked for team sports."

"I'm such a failure in relationships. I can't even keep a conversation going with my own son. It's like he doesn't want to have anything to do with me. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."

Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and how it refers to attributing causes of events or behaviors to internal factors such as personality, ability, motivation, or emotions. Please go ahead and provide the Event.
